MATRIX_MESSENGER.description: Matrix messenger properties, required always to be defined

URI.description: The URI of the Matrix Messenger server.

SERVERNAME.description: Servername of the Matrix Messenger server.

SECRET.description: Shared secret for the Matrix server.

SYNC_USER_NAME.description: Name of admin user to manage the server.

SYNC_USER_PASSWORD.description: Shared secret for the Matrix server to generate access tokens. (optional - if MATRIX_SYNC_USER_TOKEN or MATRIX_SECRET are set)

SYNC_USER_TOKEN.description: AccessToken of synchronization user which. (optional - if MATRIX_SYNC_USER_PASSWORD or MATRIX_SECRET are set)

SYNC_USER_DISPLAYNAME.description: Define a custom displayname to be set for the sync user

SYNC_USER_AVATAR_PATH.description: Upload a custom avatar for the sync user

RABBITMQ_URI.description: The URI of the RabbitMQ / AMQP server

RABBITMQ_MATRIX_QUEUE_EXTERNAL.description: The name of the RabbitMQ channel we listen to

WELCOME_MESSAGE_ADMIN.description: Great new admin users with a personal message from the sync bot

WELCOME_MESSAGE_TEACHER.description: Great new teacher users with a personal message from the sync bot

WELCOME_MESSAGE_STUDENT.description: Great new student users with a personal message from the sync bot
